# ringtoneSound

**Instance Property**

The name of the sound resource in the app bundle to be used for the provider ringtone.

## Declaration

```swift
var ringtoneSound: String? { get set }
```

## Configuring Native Call UI

- **localizedName**: The localized name of the provider.
- **iconTemplateImageData**: The PNG data for the icon image to be displayed for the provider.
